Post.title: springbootshell
Post._content:
linuxxxxx.sh
```java
#!/bin/sh

netstat -anp | grep java | grep 1511|awk '{print $7}'|cut -d / -f 1|xargs kill -9
netstat -anp | grep java | grep 1512|awk '{print $7}'|cut -d / -f 1|xargs kill -9

rm -f tppid

nohup  /opt/APP/java/bin/java    -jar /opt/APP/feeder-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar  --spring.config.location=classpath:/application-test.yml  --server.port=1511 > /dev/null 2>&1 &

nohup  /opt/APP/java/bin/java    -jar /opt/APP/feeder-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar  --spring.config.location=classpath:/application-test-1.yml  --server.port=1512 > /dev/null 2>&1 &

echo $! > tppid

echo Start Success!

```
## 1>/dev/null 2>&1 

/dev/null 
* \>  echo "123" > /home/123.txt
* 1  stdout1">/dev/null""1>/dev/null"
* 2  stderr
* &  2>&121

1 > /dev/null 2>&1 

1 > /dev/null  
2>&1 


## shell$0,$?,$!
* $$ ShellPIDProcessID
* $! ShellProcessPID
* $? 
* $- SetFlag
* $* "$*"""$1 $2  $n"
* $@ "$@"""$1" "$2"  "$n" 
* $# Shell
* $0 Shell

## netstat

netstat -anp | grep java | grep 1201|awk '{print $7}'|cut -d / -f 1|xargs kill -9
java1201

* netstat -anp 
* grep java java
* cut -d / -f 120294/java20194
* xargs

Post._content:
git: [](https://juejin.im/entry/5a574864f265da3e3c6c1217)

[1](https://blog.fundebug.com/2017/05/18/deploy-hexo-on-cloud/)[2](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000010680022)



## 

Nexogit

1git

2Hexo
``` bash
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```
3Hexo

aF:\hexo

b"Git Bash Here"
``` bash
$ hexo init
```
clocalhost:4000
``` bash
$ hexo generate
$ hexo server
```
## 

123

2Hexo_config.ymldeploygit
``` bash
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: git@github.com:daguiliu/daguiliu.github.io.git
```

3 \Hexo\source_posts .md

4hexo d -g 

## gitNexo

1gitnginx
 CentOS 
``` bash
yum -y update
yum install -y git nginx
```
2Nginx

``` bash
mkdir /data/www/hexo
chmod -R 777 /data/www/hexo
vim /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
```

listen   80


``` bash
root   /data/www/hexo;
```
3Git Hooks

``` bash
mkdir /data/blog.git
cd  /data/blog.git
git init --bare
```
4Hooks
vim /data/blog.git/hooks/post-receive

``` bash
#!/bin/bash

rm -rf /data/www/blog
git clone /data/blog.git /data/www/blog
```

post-receive
``` bash
chmod +x /data/blog.git/hooks/post-receive
```

5Hexoip152.92.13.78
_config.yml
``` bash
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: root@152.92.13.78:blog.git
```

``` bash
$ hexo d
```
http://152.92.13.78
